news.title: What eyewitness videos tell us about the Liverpool crash
news.summary: BBC Verify examines videos of the incident in which a car drove into a crowd during Liverpool FC's parade on Monday.

news.title: Why police released details about Liverpool crash suspect so quickly
news.summary: The decision shows lessons have been learned from the Southport attacks last summer, writes Daniel Sandford.

news.title: Young actors revealed for Harry Potter TV series
news.summary: An open casting call for the roles was announced last year and more than 30,000 children auditioned.

news.title: Farage pledges more tax breaks for married couples to make having children easier
news.summary: Reform leader backs lifting the two-child benefit cap and introducing more generous tax breaks for married people.

news.title: Hundreds of lawyers call for UK sanctions on Israel over Gaza war
news.summary: Their letter warns of genocide in Gaza, and calls on the UK to take concrete actions to meet its international legal obligations.

news.title: Mary Earps announces shock England retirement before Euro 2025
news.summary: England goalkeeper Mary Earps announces her retirement from international football with immediate effect - just five weeks before Euro 2025 begins.

news.title: IMF raises UK growth forecast as it warns on tax and spending
news.summary: In its annual health-check for the UK economy, the IMF predicted growth of 1.2%, a marginal upgrade to its previous forecast.

news.title: Drug-fuelled driver who caused death of three-year-old girl jailed
news.summary: Rawal Rehman is jailed for 12 years after his van hit and killed Louisa Palmisano in Manchester.

news.title: Bournemouth beach huts destroyed in overnight fire
news.summary: Crews fought the fire on East Beach, Undercliff Drive, on the Bournemouth seafront.

news.title: Ancient human fingerprint suggests Neanderthals made art
news.summary: A Neanderthal man is believed to have painted a nose on a pebble using red pigment more than 43,000 years ago.
